attributes.action: Stop forced expulsion of refugees to Rwanda
attributes.additional_details: This proposal is cruel and inhumane.
attributes.background: Reappraise the heinous proposal to force refugees  to rehabilitate to Rwanda as a future 'deterrent' to those fleeing their country of origin foe humanitarian reasons.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614913
